item.title: running gcc failed: exit status 1
item.author: 作者
item.description: 今天在编译 go 项目时出现了如下错误： 1 2 3 4 /usr/local/go/pkg/tool/linux_amd64/link: running gcc failed: exit status 1 /usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lpthread /usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lc collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status 解决办法： 1 yum install glibc-static.x86_64 -y
